projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with React and FastAPI
projects.long_description: This portfolio website showcases my skills, projects, and experience. It features a modern UI with a cold color scheme, interactive components, and a chatbot assistant. The frontend is built with React and the backend with FastAPI.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with payment integration
projects.long_description: This e-commerce platform allows users to browse products, add them to cart, and complete purchases with integrated payment processing. It includes user authentication, product management, order tracking, and an admin dashboard.

projects.title: AI Image Generator
projects.description: A web application that generates images using AI
projects.long_description: This application uses OpenAI's DALL-E API to generate images based on text prompts. Users can create, save, and share their generated images. The application includes user authentication, image history, and social sharing features.

projects.title: Task Management Application
projects.long_description: This task management application allows users to create boards, lists, and cards to organize their tasks. It includes features like drag-and-drop, due dates, labels, and team collaboration. The application is built with a modern tech stack and follows best practices for UI/UX design.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather dashboard with location-based forecasts
projects.long_description: This weather dashboard provides current weather conditions and forecasts for any location. It uses geolocation to automatically detect the user's location and displays weather data in an intuitive interface. Users can save favorite locations and view historical weather data.

projects.title: Blockchain Explorer
projects.description: A web application for exploring blockchain data
projects.long_description: This blockchain explorer allows users to search for and view information about blocks, transactions, and addresses on various blockchains. It provides real-time data and visualizations to help users understand blockchain activity. The application supports multiple blockchains and includes advanced filtering options.
